title: MR Percy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pull a rabbit out of a hat and throw it a player, attacking them Powerful-ly.
- Fire a triple rainbow beam, dealing a Basic attack to three targets tonight. (2 uses)
- Entangle a player. If they're aligned with you, they will get two Basic autovests that last for this night and the next. If they're enemy, their defense will be set to Vulnerable for the same duration. Either way, if the player you selected dies while the duration is up, you get assist XP, which is to say that you get a role that says "+[X] XP" where X is the amount of games the selected player has won before.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- Spend Magician Points to create a spirit of nature. Using this ability alone costs two Magician Points and will create a new player with no abilities/attributes, and a Town goal. You may spend additional Magician Points to give them any of your currently existing abilities or attributes. One ability/attribute costs one Magician Point. The spirit of nature spawns at the start of the next day and can be controlled by you, even from death.
Attributes:
- You may choose for your attacks to instead give defense of the same tier.
- Whenever someone who opposes you dies, you gain a Magician Point, which can be used to fuel your spirit creation.

desc:
Post 3502
*A magician turned druid with a penchant for power.*
